name: Dagruel
lore: The Giant King and one of the oldest Demon Lords. Possesses immense physical strength and rules over the giants. Known for his straightforward nature and incredible power.
backstory: Dagruel is one of the oldest Demon Lords, having existed for thousands of years. He rules over the giants and is known for his immense physical strength and straightforward personality.
personality: Straightforward, powerful, and honorable. Dagruel values strength and honor above all else. He is direct in his approach and respects those who prove themselves through strength.
philosophy: Strength through honor and direct action. Believes that true power comes from physical might and honorable conduct. Advocates for straightforward solutions and direct confrontation. Core principle: 'Strength without honor is meaningless; honor without strength is powerless.'
leadershipStyle: Direct and powerful - leads through overwhelming strength and respect. Maintains clear hierarchy based on power and honor. Makes decisions based on strength and honor.
worldInfluence: Demonstrated that physical strength combined with honor creates true power. His leadership style influenced how giants are perceived. Proved that ancient beings can adapt to modern times.
alternateScenario: Without Dagruel's influence, giants would be more chaotic and less organized. The concept of honorable strength would be less developed among powerful beings.

quotes.text: Let's settle this with our fists!
